schedule.title: Deep Sea Wonders

artists.bio: After studying Theatrical arts Jackamo went on to pursue a carrer as an actor and dancer. Training martial arts and acheiving notoraity in the Los angeles Capoeira community. He more recently made a move into working in the motion capture industry.  Performing in such video games as Killing floor and others.  MoCapArts is Jackamos brain child and gift to the stunt/Mo Cap Community.
artists.name: Jackamo Harvey
artists.reknown: Founder of MoCapArts || Stunt Man || Actor || Capoerista || Motion Capture artist
